original_text: Also, of the sons of the priests: the sons of Habaiah, the sons of Hakkoz, and the sons of Barzillai (who had taken a wife from the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite, and was called by their name).
korean_text: 제사장 중에는 하바야 자손과 학고스 자손과 바르실래 자손이니 바르실래는 길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸 중의 한 사람을 아내로 삼고 바르실래의 이름을 따른 자라

sentences.original_text: Also, of the sons of the priests:
(who had taken a wife from the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite,
sentences.korean_translation: (길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸 중에서 아내를 맞이했고,

sentences.original_text: and was called by their name).
